name: F1 2013: Classic Edition
summary:
F1 2013: Classic Edition is a premium package which features all the cars, stars and circuits from the 2013 FIA Formula One World Championship plus, for the first time in the series, classic content. F1 Classics is an expansive new game mode in which you’ll race legendary drivers in famous cars at iconic circuits from the 1980s. It also features extra content from the 1990s and additional Classic Tracks which can be played in F1 Classics, split-screen and online multiplayer.

The game also features all of the new drivers, team moves, tyre changes and remodelled handling to recreate the thrill of racing 2013’s stunning roster of Formula One cars. New enhancements, improvements plus new, expanded and returning game modes combine to deliver the most complete simulation of a Formula One season in videogame history.
